nodes.text: Lyle Lippstroot was a cyborg bookkeeper serving the Rodian crime lord Vop the Usurer. Lippstroot was addicted to lesai, and had a 221 cyber-interface neural interface band for processing data. Lippstroot was assassinated by an agent of Vop's rival, Ritinki, who introduced a Bartokk program-trap into data being processed by his cybernetic implant.
